Help would be greatly appreciated

Your github project has no vendor dependencies so its hard to use but to start with, change your jsonConstants folder name to modules and point at the swerve folder directly in Robot Container Filesystem getDeploy

You have this same location in all 4 of your modules. That is wrong.
“location”: {
“front”: -12,
“left”: 12
}
They represent the location of the 4 modules with respect to the center of the chassis.

You are missing several items from the physicalproperties.json,
one of them being wheel diameter.

You should either start again with YAGSL config or download the yagsl example from
GitHub - FRC-9438/Yagsl_2025
and compare the module json files for particularly location, then the physicalproperties line by line, substituting your own values.

It would be better not to use CANIDs 1 and 2 as they are typically reserved for PDP and Pneumatic modules.

Also try using Simulation instead of downloading to a robot for test. I could tell there were json problems because no robot showed on Field2d after substituting yours for the yagsl example.
